info.name: Product Data
info.description:
Product Data - OData Examples
=============================

Examples to create and change Materials and Service products business objects using SAP Business ByDesign Custom OData Services.

Product types:
- 1 - Materials
- 2 - Service Products


 

Materials: Creates material products along with relevant information
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Required user authorizations (ByD Work Center Views):
- *Product Data - Materials*
- *Product Data - Services*

Scenario: Material maintainance
1. Create material with General informaiton like ID, Description, Product Category, Identified stock type, Base UoM and quantity conversion data
2. Updates material with Purchasing data like purchasing unit of measure and sets the purchasing status to active
3. Updates material with Logistics data like logistics unit of measure, sites info and sets the logistics status to active
4. Updates material with Planning data like Planning Area ID, Default Procurement Method, Supply Planning Procedure, LotSizeProcedureCode and sets the planning areas status to active 
5. Updates material with Availability Confirmation data like Planning Area ID, Availability Check Scope and sets the planning areas status to active
6. Updates material with Sales data like Item Group, Cash Discount Allowed indicator and sets the Distribution Chains status to active
7. Updates material with Sales data like Valuation Level Type, Company, Business Residence and sets the valuation status to active
8. Updates material with proudct tax classification data


 

Scenario: Creates service products along with relevant information
------------------------------------------------------

Required user authorizations (ByD Work Center Views):
- *Product Data - Services*

Scenario: Service product maintainance
1. Create service with General informaiton like ID, Description, Product Category, Identified stock type, Base UoM and quantity conversion data
2. Updates service with Purchasing data like purchasing unit of measure and sets the purchasing status to active
3. Updates service with Sales data like Item Group, Cash Discount Allowed indicator and sets the Distribution Chains status to active
4. Updates service with Sales data like Valuation Level Type, Company and sets the valuation status to active

item.description:
Product Data SAP Business ByDesin Collection
postman collection is to create and update Products (Material and Service Products) data of SAP Business ByDesign in sales demo system

Supported environment:
E2E Scenarios - PM 338338

 
Materials Folder : Creates Materail General, Purchasing, Logistics, Planning , Availability Confirmation, Sales, Valuation data
Required user authorizations (ByD Work Center Views):
Product Data - Materials


Scenario:
Creates General Information
Creates Quantity Conversion
Creates and updates and activates Purchasing information
Creates and updates and activates Logistics information
Creates and updates and activates Planning information
Creates and updates and activates Availability information
Creates and updates and activates Sales information
Creates and updates and activates Valuation information


 
Services Folder : Creates Service Product General, Purchasing, Sales, Valuation data
Required user authorizations (ByD Work Center Views):
Product Data - Services


Scenario:
Creates General Information
Creates Quantity Conversion
Creates and updates and activates Purchasing information
Creates and updates and activates Sales information
Creates and updates and activates Valuation information
